articles.description: “I do not think metal stocks have crashed but they are consolidating and underperforming the market a little bit. This is a smaller cycle within the larger cycle and there is good demand visibility in the larger cycle.”
articles.content: "My pecking order for metal companies would be PSU steel companies followed by larger steel companies followed by aluminium companies," says Rakesh Arora, Founder, Go India Advisors.The metal sector … [+6544 chars]
